summary: I've just read a drarry fic where Harry tells Draco that the Sorting Heat wanted to put him in Slytherin at first. Surprised,...
body:
I’ve just read a drarry fic where Harry tells Draco that the Sorting Heat wanted to put him in Slytherin at first. Surprised, Draco orders Harry to try his Slytherin clothes on. Harry does.

HARRY. IN DRACO’S CLOTHES.

Thank you. My life’s complete now.

summary: Draco & Harry HCs
body:
Draco & Harry HCs


Requested by anon

Request: How about a draco and Harry hc with lots of pain involved

A/n: I hope this was ok I feel as tho it could be better but yea…


* First and second year Draco was at Harry’s throat with name calling and other mean things

* By third year Draco starts to feel sad for harry because of more he’s learned about his parents

* Fourth year Draco starts to realize his feelings towards Harry but knows coming from two different blood stats and worlds in general he decides to keep the feelings inside and starts to be rude once more

* Fifth year with he who must not be named being back and a new changes at school Draco feels his chance to tell harry everything is slipping away and knows there’s a war soon to come

* Sixth year brings the problems of death eaters and the fear of belatrix loose. Even worse Draco is forced with the dark mark and the task to kill Dumbledore someone who means so much to Harry and has never really been a problem to Draco himself

* Becoming depressed Draco pushes his self away from everyone including Harry

* The final year has come and so is the battle. Draco still fines it’s difficult to choose between his family and harry. Even with all he’s done to him Harry still manages to save him from a fire, showing Draco that Harry has a true heart of gold.

* Upon hearing of Harry’s death Draco fears what will come to the world. Choosing to stick with his family over fighting Voldemort even once it’s shown that Harry is alive

* Draco feels it’s best to run away after everything he’s done not just to Harry but his friends as well

summary: Remadora headcanons about their sex life I can't stop thinking about
body:
Remadora headcanons about their sex life I can’t stop thinking about

- Tonks calling Remus ‘Daddy’

- Remus being confused about her calling him 'Daddy’

- He getting used to it and actually likes it

- Tonks waiting for Remus naked for him to come home

- Remus being shy the first time this happens

- Remus waiting for Tonks naked for her to come home

- Him regretting doing so because she starts laughing in the first place

- She comforting him and making it a special time

- Tonks totally loves getting slapped on her ass

- Remus being sensitive on his inner thighs

- Remus having trouble to undress her bra

- Tonks stops wearing bras

- sometimes slips as well

- Remus loves eating out

- Tonks having the best orgasm while he’s eating out

- Remus getting more and more confident

- Tonks enjoying the view of his body

- Tonks absolutely adoring him being carefree when they are having sex

- Remus getting spontaneous

- They had sex on ridiculous places

- before and after full moon Tonks just rubbed his back and none of them even thought about sex

blog.name: thefandomimagine
blog.title: The Fandom Imagine
blog.description: Buy Me A Coffee Patreon Page WARNING:These tags do include NSFW posts Marvel Doctor Who Harry Potter LOTR Sherlock Supernatural Star Wars OUAT Teen Wolf DC Others Oneshots Aesthetic Fake Texts Headcanons Moodboards NSFW An imagines blog for any and all fandoms. Please note that I do not own any of the gifs used and if you see any of your own gifs, then message me and I will happily put your name in the tags, to give credit where credit is due or remove it if that is what you wish. You are always welcome to write stories based on any of the imagines I myself will do gif imagines, fake texts, aesthetics and headcanons. However any oneshots on the blog are wrote by followers. If you wish to submit a oneshot idea than I will post it to everyone, however it is up to them if it is actually published. NSFW posts are published on the last Sunday of the month. All fandoms are welcome.

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: Submitted by anonymous.
caption: Submitted by anonymous.

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: — masterlist.
title: — masterlist.
body:
— rules.

— characters i will write for:
    (dcu) barry allen, cisco ramon, wally west, caitlin snow, eddie thawne, kaldur’ahm, dick grayson, jason todd, tim drake, damian wayne, conner kent, megan morse, artemis crock, clark kent, bruce wayne, diana prince, steve trevor and oliver queen
    (harry potter) harry potter, ron weasley, hermione granger, sirius black, james potter, remus lupin, lily potter, fred weasley, george weasley, ginny weasley, cedric diggory, luna lovegood, neville longbottom and draco malfoy
    (fantastic beasts)  newt scamander, tina goldstein, queenie goldstein, jacob kowalski, credence barebone, original percival graves and theseus scamander
    (mcu) thor odinson, tony stark, bruce banner, steve rogers, clint barton, pietro maximoff, wanda maximoff, bucky barnes, t’challa, natasha romanoff, mantis, peter quill, gamora, sam wilson, peter parker, scott lang, michelle jones, ned leeds and loki laufeyson
— what i will not write about:
    smut, suicide, rape, incest, infidelity and character/character (ships)
— also, please note that i am a student who also has a part-time job! i take part in extra-curricular activities as well, so i don’t always have a lot of time to write. if you send in a request, please be patient! i’ll get to it as soon as i can, i promise.

— key.

— ♥  ; angst
— ♡ ; fluff
— ❦ ; personal favourite

— dc universe.

— coming soon.

— harry potter.

— coming soon.

— fantastic beasts and where to find them.

— newt scamander
    ➸ sudden ; newt catches (y/n) playing with the Occamies.

— marvel universe.

— coming soon.

— what i will not write about:
    smut, suicide, rape, incest, infidelity and character/character (ships)
— also, please note that i am a student who also has a part-time job! i take part in extra-curricular activities as well, so i don’t always have a lot of time to write. if you send in a request, please be patient! i’ll get to it as soon as i can, i promise.

— key.

— ♥  ; angst
— ♡ ; fluff
— ❦ ; personal favourite

— dc universe.

— coming soon.

— harry potter.

— coming soon.

— fantastic beasts and where to find them.

— newt scamander
    ➸ sudden ; newt catches (y/n) playing with the Occamies.

— marvel universe.

— coming soon.

blog.name: jcinkgalore
blog.title: jcink galore
blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary:
E C H O E S / POST-POTTER 2030 

 In 2030, technology has pulled magic out from under the circuit boards—a savior of a city...
caption:
E C H O E S / POST-POTTER 2030 

In 2030, technology has pulled magic out from under the circuit boards—a savior of a city emerges from the frenzy that ensues.

Welcome to New London, a chrome Babylon fueled by science and sorcery. 

INDEX / INFORMATION / REQUESTS / DISCORD

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
fanatstic beasts the crimes of grindelwald
summary:
~You know, your eyes really are...
~Are what?
~...Im not supposed to say that. See, in reality they have this effect in them,...
body:
~You know, your eyes really are…

~Are what?

~…Im not supposed to say that. See, in reality they have this effect in them, Tina. It’s like fire in water, in dark water. I’ve only ever seen that… I’ve only ever seen that in…

~Salamanders?

reblog.comment:
